display_long_description:
⛓️ Chained Together, Fighting for Freedom ⛓️
Chained Escape VR is a reverse engineered game that throws you into a fast-paced, physics-driven adventure where players, connected by chains, must climb, swing, and survive together. Up to 4 players can team up (or sabotage each other) in a frantic race against time and exhaustion!

🛠️ Master Chain Physics and Creative Movement 🛠️
Every chain link matters. Swing from teammates, catch falling friends, or forge risky solo paths. The dynamic physics system rewards skillful movement, quick thinking, and unexpected solutions.

🐧 Break Free and Rise Above 🐧
You and your crew are trapped in a strange, hostile world, forced into endless labor. Break your chains, defy your captors, and escape the depths together—one desperate leap at a time.
